official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to make minor and technical corrections to maps depicting the Coastal Barrier Resources System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make such minor and technical corrections to maps referred to in provisions of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act as are necessary to ensure the accurate depiction of certain areas as those areas existed on the date of enactment of the Coastal Barrier Improvement Act of 1990.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to make minor and technical corrections to maps depicting the Coastal Barrier Resources System.
